Chamb√©ry, France and Lausanne, Switzerland - Python and Javascript devs - geospatial and business

All open source.

Geospatial development is primarily Javascript (OpenLayers, Ext.js) and Python (Pylons, SQLAlchemy, etc.).

Business development is Python (OpenERP).

Full list of positions: http://www.camptocamp.com/en/careers
